short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A delightfully simple Chrome extension that can effortlessly save, sync, and reopen your tab groups upon startup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

🗂️ Effortlessly save and sync your tab groups across Chrome sessions.
🚀 Instantly reopen your saved tab groups when starting Chrome.
🔎 Quick access to your individual tabs within your saved groups. Instantly switch your active tab through Trove.
🗑️ Easily manage your tab groups by clearing them from storage when necessary.

Made with ❤️ from 🇨🇦
